OOC: Dollen, DrillBit, and Dark Mouse are at the same table.

::DrillBit::

"Heh. It means their insane. Not all right in the head."

::Demolition::

He arrived back at Alliance Island. He transformed back to bot mode, and
entered the Iron Fist. He quickly got to a CR chamber.
